title: Xactimate 25
description:
Introducing XactimateÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® 25

Xactware is excited to unveil the latest version of its number one estimating solution, Xactimate 25.

Xactimate 25 is even smarter than before. Customize coverages to reflect the policy by specifying limit, deductible, and reserve. The newly designed Summary section of the reports accounts for coverage limits, insured participation, and coinsurance if applicable. The deductible will be applied to the coverage where it is most beneficial to the insured.

Xactimate 25 has truly made estimating simple for your workflow. The Xactimate Dashboard displays your most recent projects and assignments, the Claim manager and its reports are better integrated into your estimating workflow, and you can view your projects from multiple profiles in a single list.

What can you do in a single click?

The simple and smart approach of Xactimate 25 has led to a number of features that are new to the industry and only a click away.

    * Estimate in English, Spanish, and French
    * Print reports in English, Spanish, and French
    * Run an insulation wizard complete with wall (interior and exterior), ceiling, and floor preferences
    * Run an HVAC wizard complete with heating / cooling unit, ductwork, thermostat, vents, and more
    * Run a plumbing wizard complete with bathroom, laundry, and kitchen preferences

The advancements in Xactimate 25 are incredible and are designed with you in mind. We hope you enjoy using the latest version of the industry\&#039;s number one estimating program.
